title: Design Underground Ventilation Circuit
description: A ventilation engineer designs a ventilation system for a new section of an underground mine to ensure sufficient air is supplied.

tasks.description: Create a 3D model of the new mine tunnels (drifts) in the ventilation simulation software.
tasks.expected_outcome: An accurate model of the mine layout is created.

tasks.description: Determine the required airflow in each tunnel based on the diesel equipment that will be used and the number of personnel.
tasks.expected_outcome: The required air quantities for each part of the new section are calculated.

tasks.description: Run a ventilation simulation to select the correct size and location for new fans and regulators to achieve the required airflows.
tasks.expected_outcome: The simulation results in a ventilation design that is safe and energy-efficient.
